purpleculture_info: Pictographic: A pig drawn on its side
purpleculture_examples:
狼奔豕突 [ láng bēn shǐ tū ]: the wolf runs and the wild boar rushes (idiom); crowds of evil-doers mill around like wild beasts
野豕 [ yě shǐ ]: wild boar
豕交兽畜 [ shǐ jiāo shòu chù ]: to treat people like beasts (idiom)
豕豞 [ shǐ hòu ]: grunting of pigs

Ru_AutoNotes:
Кабан - дикое животное, предок домашней свиньи.

У кабана в японском много похожих названий: イノシシ, イノコ, イ, シシ. В древнеяпонском кабан назывался イ(ウィ), а 猪の肉イののシシ и 猪の子イのこ - это "плоть кабана" и "маленький кабан, кабанчик". Тем не менее, именно イノシシ сейчас используется шире всего.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 猪(い、いのしし、チョ кабан), 豕 (シ свинья), 亥 (い、ガイ знак кабана, 12-й знак китайского зодиака).
Ru_trainchinese:

shǐ: (графема) (книжн., сейчас используется редко) свинья
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The oracle bone inscriptions are more like an upright pig shape from the side. Its common characteristics are the obvious abdominal lines and the slightly hanging tail. Occasionally, there are glyphs that add long and dense hair on the neck of the " hog ".

The characters of " hog " and " dog " in oracle bone inscriptions are similar. The difference between the two characters is that the tail shape of " hog " is drooping, and the abdomen is fatter, while the tail shape of " dog " is upside down and the abdomen is thinner. See " dog ". The emblem of the Bronze clan has a more pictographic character " Hig ", which is either horizontal or upright, and there is also a " Hig " that gradually changes from an image to a line; the small seal inherits the latter. "Shuowen": "Hog, hog. Exhaust its tail, so it is called hog. Like hairy feet and then has a tail. Reading the same as hog. Eucalyptus: The word for this, mistakenly used hog for hog, and hog for hog. Why? Mingzhi? It means pecking from the hog, and from the hog. The sound is taken, so it is clear. All the genus of the hog is from the hog. 𧰧, ancient prose." Among them, the "jin 丗" and other notes may not be made by Xu Shen, Duan Yu Editing "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "These thirty-three characters may not be Xu Yu. However, each version of Jiaojia is very special, and it is now being corrected."

The ancient " hog " or " pig " were mostly huge in size and acted like the wind. They were brave and violent, fighting against tigers with their feet (see "豦"). So " hog " was ancient China's important totem, according to different regions, can have a variety of different names, such as " boar ", " pig ", " pig ", " dolphin ", " Xi ", etc. (see "dialect. Volume 8). The character "豕" later became an important radical of Chinese characters and an important part of many characters. See " pig ".

The oracle bone inscription is used as the original meaning, referring to pigs, "Compilation" 390 reverse: "to hog, only (get)." Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning, referring to pigs. The pig's tripod.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning, referring to pigs, "Shangbo Bamboo Book III. Zhouyi Jian 23: "Fen (豮) hog's tooth", silk book "Zhouyi" as "Crying (豮) tooth". Liao Mingchun thought " cry " was the equivalent of " 𠳵 ", and " 𠳵 " had the meaning of concealment. The whole sentence meant to hide the fangs of a pig. Today’s "Zhou Yi" is written as "the teeth of the hog", Wang Bi noted: "The hog's teeth are violent, hard to make things difficult... , There will be celebration." Kong Yingda Zhengyi quoted Chu: "Chun, get rid of your teeth, get rid of your teeth."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: An oracle-bone inscription is more like an erect pig-shaped side-viewed. Its common features are obvious abdominal lines and a slightly drooping tail. Occasionally, there are glyphs that add long, dense hair on the neck of the " hog ".
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文多象側視的豎立豬形，其普遍的特點在於明顯的腹部線條及微垂的尾巴，偶爾有字形在「豕」的頸上加上長而密的毛髮。

　　甲骨文「豕」、「犬」字形相近，二字差別在於「豕」尾形下垂，腹部較肥，「犬」尾形上蹶，腹部較瘦。參見「犬」。金文族氏徽號有較象形之「豕」字，字形或橫置，或豎起，亦有由圖象漸變為線條的「豕」；小篆承後者。《說文》：「豕，彘也。竭其尾，故謂之豕。象毛足而後有尾。讀與豨同。桉：今丗字，誤以豕爲彘，以彘爲豕。何以明之？爲啄琢从豕，蟸从彘。皆取其聲，以是明之。凡豕之屬皆从豕。𧰧，古文。」其中「今丗字」等按語或非許慎所作，段玉裁《說文解字注》：「此三十三字未必爲許語。而各本譌舛特甚，今正之。」

　　古代的「豕」或「豬」，大都體積龐大，行動如風，其勇猛慓悍，足與虎鬥(參見「豦」)。故「豕」曾是古代中國的重要圖騰，按地域的不同，可有各種不同的稱謂，如「豭」、「彘」、「豨」、「豚」、「貕」等(參見《方言．卷八》)。「豕」字後來又成為漢字的重要部首，成為許多字的重要部件。參見「豬」。

　　甲骨文用作本義，指豬隻，《合集》390反：「逐豕，隻(獲)。」金文用作本義，指豬隻，圅皇父鼎：「豕鼎」，指用來烹煮豬隻的鼎器。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，指豬隻，《上博竹書三．周易》簡23：「芬(豶)豕之牙」，帛書本《周易》作「哭豨(豕)之牙」。廖名春以為「哭」為「𠳵」之訛，「𠳵」有隱去之義，全句指隱藏豬的尖牙的意思。今本《周易》作「豶豕之牙」，王弼注：「豕牙橫暴，剛暴難制之物……能豶其牙，柔能制健，禁暴抑盛，豈唯能固其位，乃將有慶也。」孔穎達正義引褚氏：「豶，除也，除其牙也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文多象側視的豎立豬形，其普遍的特點在於明顯的腹部線條及微垂的尾巴，偶爾有字形在「豕」的頸上加上長而密的毛髮。

Occasionally, there are glyphs that add long and dense hair on the neck of the " hog". The characters of " hog" and " dog" in oracle bone inscriptions are similar. The difference between the two characters is that the tail shape of " hog" is drooping, and the abdomen is fatter, while the tail shape of " dog" is upside down and the abdomen is thinner. See " dog". The emblem of the Bronze clan has a more pictographic character " Hig", which is either horizontal or upright, and there is also a " Hig" that gradually changes from an image to a line; the small seal inherits the latter. "Shuowen": "Hog, hog. Exhaust its tail, so it is called hog. Like hairy feet and then has a tail. Reading the same as hog. Eucalyptus: The word for this, mistakenly used hog for hog, and hog for hog. Why? Mingzhi? It means pecking from the hog, and from the hog. The sound is taken, so it is clear. All the genus of the hog is from the hog. 𧰧, ancient prose." Among them, the "jin 丗" and other notes may not be made by Xu Shen, Duan Yu Editing "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "These thirty-three characters may not be Xu Yu. However, each version of Jiaojia is very special, and it is now being corrected." The ancient " hog" or " pig" were mostly huge in size and acted like the wind. They were brave and violent, fighting against tigers with their feet (see " 豦"). So " hog" was ancient China's important totem, according to different regions, can have a variety of different names, such as " boar", " pig", " pig", " dolphin", " Xi", etc. (see "dialect. Volume 8). The character " 豕" later became an important radical of Chinese characters and an important part of many characters. See " pig". 豕字的基本解释

豕
shǐ
猪：封豕长蛇。狼奔豕突（喻人奔逃时的惊慌状态，像被追赶的狼和猪那样奔突乱窜）。

豕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shǐ］
［《廣韻》施是切，上紙，書。］
猪。

豕字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豕； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页1194第04
〔古文〕???【廣韻】施是切【集韻】【韻會】賞是切【正韻】詩止切，?音始。【說文】彘也。竭其尾，故謂之豕，象毛足而後有尾。【徐曰】竭，舉也。【玉篇】豬豨之總名。【揚子·方言】豬，關東西或謂之彘，或謂之豕。【林氏小說】以其食不絜，故名之豕。【大戴禮·易本命】四主時，時主豕，故豕四月而生。【本草綱目】李時珍曰：在畜屬水，在卦屬坎，在禽應室星。【易·說卦】坎爲豕。【埤雅】坎性趨下，豕能俯其首，又喜?穢，亦水畜也。【詩·小雅】有豕白蹢，烝涉波矣。【傳】犬喜雪，馬喜風，豕喜雨，故天將久雨，則豕進涉水波。【禮·曲禮】豕曰剛鬣。【疏】豕肥則毛鬣剛大也。【周禮·天官·食醫】凡會膳食之宜，豕宜稷。【疏】豭豬味酸，牝豬味苦，稷米味甘，是甘苦相成。　又國名。【左傳·襄二十四年】范宣子曰：昔匄之祖在商爲豕韋氏。【註】豕韋，國名。　又星名。【博雅】營室謂之豕韋。又【史記·天官書】奎曰封豕，爲溝瀆。【前漢·天文志】作封豨。　又藥名。【爾雅·釋草】茢薽，豕首。【疏】豕首，一名

豕字的源字形

豕字的起名意思

暂无。

hog
Basic explanation of words
hog
shǐ
Pig: Seal the hog long snake. The wolf rushes and hogs (Yu people panic when they are running, running like a wolf and a pig being chased).
hog
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shǐ]
["Guang Yun" Shi Shi cut, paper, book. ]
pig.
hog
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Wu Character Department】　豕; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 1194 Page 04
[Ancient text]??? [Guang Yun] Shi is cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Appreciation is cut [Zheng Yun] The poem stops cutting, and the sound begins. [Said the text] Yeah. Exhaust its tail, so it is called a hog, like a hairy foot and then a tail. [Xu Yue] Exhaust, give up. [Jade articles] The general name of pigs. 【Yangtze Dialect】Pig, Guan Dong is called Zhi Lun, or called Pig. [Lin's Novels] Because of its inability to eat, it is named hog. [Big Daili·Yi Benming] When the four masters, the time dominates the hog, so the hog was born in April. [Compendium of Materia Medica] Li Shizhen said: The animal is water, the hexagram is the ridge, and the bird is the star. [Yi·Said Gua] Kan is a hog. 【Piya】The hurdle tends to decline, and the hog can bow to its head, and likes to be filthy, and also aquatic animals. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】There are hogs, white stalks, and waves. [Biography] Dogs like snow, horses like wind, hogs like rain, so if it rains for a long time, hogs wading into the waves. 【Li·Chu Li】The hog said to just go. [Sparse] If the hog is fat, the hair is just big. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Food Doctor】Whoever can eat is suitable, hog is suitable for rice. 【Sparse】The taste of pig is sour, the taste of pig is bitter, and the taste of rice is sweet, which is a combination of sweetness and bitterness.　 Also the name of the country. [Twenty-four years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang] Fan Xuanzi said: The ancestor of the former scorpion was Wei Wei Chong in Shang. [Note] Pig Wei, the name of the country.　Also star name. [Bo Ya] The camp is called hogweed. Also [Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials] Kui said to seal the hog, which is a ditch. 【Pre-Han·Astronomy Chronicles】As a seal.　Also the name of the medicine. 【Erya·Shucao】Champignon, hog head. Первоначальное значение - «свинья».
По форме надписи на кости оракула напоминают свинью, с головой вверх и хвостом вниз, с животом толстой фигуры посередине.
, По сравнению с «Да» Ю, «Собака» имеет длинный хвост и стройное брюшко, характеристики явно другие.

豕 (свинья)

Кабан - дикое животное, предок домашней свиньи.

У кабана в японском много похожих названий: イノシシ, イノコ, イ, シシ. В древнеяпонском кабан назывался イ(ウィ), а 猪の肉イののシシ и 猪の子イのこ - это "плоть кабана" и "маленький кабан, кабанчик". Тем не менее, именно イノシシ сейчас используется шире всего.

Сравни: 猪(い、いのしし、チョ кабан), 豕 (シ свинья), 亥 (い、ガイ знак кабана, 12-й знак китайского зодиака).
